scenario_text.value:
Whaddya mean, have there been any reports of
strange things going on around here?
I mean, it seems like something’s going on...
Oh, it’s been goin’ on, alright.

(Looks like there’s been quite a fuss over us
after all...)

(What if the police ask us what happened?
What will we say?)

Ya see, a few students who came here to go
camping went missing.

Everyone’s sayin’ they mighta got caught in
the landslide.

The police just left to meet with their
teacher a few minutes ago.
...Just a few minutes ago?
(Huh? What’s he talking about?)

(How many days have passed since the
landslide when we went to the other world?!)
What does all this mean, Takuma?
I have no clue, honestly.

But I guess time passes at different rates
here in this world and in the other one?

“This world”? “The other one”? What the
heck’re you goin’ on about?
Uh, nothing! Just ignore that!

Anyway, how’s the shrine where the landslide
happened? Is it holding up?

Well, aren’t you inquisitive! But I don’t
think they’ve finished investigating yet.

The shrine was in ruins already, so they’ve
been tellin’ people not to go near it.
The shrine...in ruins? What?!
(What’s with Miyuki all of a sudden?)

Oh, it’s been decades since anyone looked
after that old place...

Apparently it used to be quite nice. You’d
never guess from the way it is now, though.
D-decades...?
What is it, Miyuki?

Anyway, it’s not safe to go there so I’d stay
away if I were you.

Earlier there was a landslide at the entrance
to the tunnel near the shrine, ya know.

And now they’re sayin’ some students got
caught in it, so stay far away, all right?
